word_mean: 一项固定资产在使用过程中因磨损老化或技术陈旧而逐渐损失其价值的现象。也指估计这种损失的行为。

sentence.Network_en: A depreciation of a currency'svalue makes imports more expensive and exports cheaper.
sentence.Network_cn: 一国货币的贬值会使其进口更贵，出口更便宜。

sentence.Network_en: They wrote off 500 for depreciation of machinery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们注销了500镑作为机器折旧费.

sentence.Network_en: She can't bear the depreciation of the enemy.

entry.def: If something such as a currency depreciates or if something depreciates it, it loses some of its original value.

example.ex: Countries may also find their currency is depreciating in foreign markets.
example.tran: 一些国家也可能会发现自己的货币正在国外市场上贬值。

example.ex: The demand for foreign currency depreciates the real value of local currencies...
example.tran: 对外汇的需求致使本币的实际价值下跌。

means.word_mean: 1. a decrease in price or value;

sentences.sentence: "depreciation of the dollar against the yen"

means.word_mean: 2. decrease in value of an asset due to obsolescence or use
3. a communication that belittles somebody or something

auth_sentence.content: So such sharp depreciation can be inflationary in nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: So such sharp depreciation can be inflationary in nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So such sharp depreciation can be inflationary in nature.

auth_sentence.content: Investors pay current taxes only on the income that exceeds depreciation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Investors pay current taxes only on the income that exceeds depreciation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Investors pay current taxes only on the income that exceeds depreciation.

auth_sentence.content: One of the criticisms of Ebitda is that it excludes depreciation charges.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the criticisms of Ebitda is that it excludes depreciation charges.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the criticisms of Ebitda is that it excludes depreciation charges.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+preci价值,估价+able能……的→adj.可估价的;可察觉的
depreciate[v.贬低,贬值]+ion表名词→n.折旧,价值下降
ap一再+preci价值+ate表动词→一再给价→欣赏
de去掉+preci价值,估价+ate表动词→去掉价值→贬值

sentences.en: They wrote off 500 for depreciation of machinery.
sentences.cn: 他们注销了500镑作为机器折旧费。

sentences.en: The depreciation of other currencies in Asia has also caused a substantial reduction in tourism.
sentences.cn: 亚洲其他货币贬值，亦严重打击了本港的旅游业。

sentences.en: She can’t bear the depreciation of the enemy.
